<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/user-svc/permissions"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



List permissions by roles.
Caller can only list permissions for roles they have.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

>
